overview: Infidelity is the tie that binds in this modern tale of love. Mae recognizes that her long-term partner, April has lost passion for her. So, Mae insidiously invites the irritating nymphet, Joon, to be their house-guest. As revenge? As a distraction? When April and Joon are left alone for an evening, April finds her annoyance with Joon transforms into a game-changing curiosity.
title: Sugar Cookie
